content.signup: Please use this page to sign up. Once signed in you will be able to save your own links, and view them on the user details page. Currently you are restricted to Guest login only.
content.welcome: Welcome to the Learn Space application. The application makes use fof the Nasa Video and Image API. The application allows keyword searches. Results are limited ae 10 currently per search. It is also possible to save links and review them on the user details page.
content.about: This application makes use of the NASA Open API for images. Content is allowed to be displayed under Nasa Copyright.
